## AI agent products - commercial and open source

This section provides details on various commercial and open-source Computer AI Agent vendors. Each page will cover the specific vendor, their technology, typical use cases, and how they can be integrated with Tallyfy to automate tasks within your processes.

Understanding the offerings of different vendors will help you choose the right agent technology to complement your Tallyfy workflows, particularly for tasks that require interaction with web browsers or other desktop applications where traditional API-based automation is not feasible or is too complex.

Explore the specific vendor pages to learn more:

import PageTree from '@/components/PageTree.astro';

<PageTree />

<LinkTitleCard header="<b>Vendors > Twin.so AI Agents and Tallyfy</b>" href="/products/pro/integrations/computer-ai-agents/vendors/twin/" > Learn how Twin.so's AI agents automate web tasks in Tallyfy processes via browser interaction using natural language goals and its multimodal Action Model. </LinkTitleCard>
<LinkTitleCard header="<b>Vendors > Skyvern AI Agents and Tallyfy</b>" href="/products/pro/integrations/computer-ai-agents/vendors/skyvern/" > Explore how Tallyfy integrates with Skyvern, an open-source AI agent for automating browser workflows using LLMs, computer vision, and natural language prompts. </LinkTitleCard>
<LinkTitleCard header="<b>Vendors > OpenAI Operator and Tallyfy</b>" href="/products/pro/integrations/computer-ai-agents/vendors/openai-operator/" > Learn about OpenAI's Operator, an AI agent for web tasks, its CUA model, and how it could integrate with Tallyfy for enhanced automation. </LinkTitleCard>
